Rare disease patients have complex clinical representations. Patients with Epilepsy, Juvenile Absence present clinical features that include the following:

Inherited disease

Epilepsy

Absence seizures

Progressive myoclonic epilepsy

Absence seizures

Myoclonic seizures

Generalized tonic-clonic seizures

Myoclonic seizures

Juvenile absence epilepsy
